item.description:
We leave the boat ramp at 10 AM please have your boat unloaded and ready.

We will meet at the boat launch at the intersection of RT 9 and RT 67. When you turn off of RT 9 on to 67 there is a break in the guard rail before the bridge. There may be no sign. There is a good size parking lot. The launch area is in the back corner near the river.

I plan on paddling up towards White's Landing then back to the launch at RT 67. I am guessing it will take 1 1/2 hours to get to Whites Landing. I have not timed this paddle before.

This is an easy paddle on a slow moving river.

PFD's are required.
item.name: Quaboag River W. Brookfield, MA
